meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: These regulations may be cited as the Massage Establishments Regulations.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Form of application for licence and renewal
section.content: The prescribed form of an application for a licence and for the renewal of a licence shall be that in Form 1 in Schedule 1.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Application for licence and renewal of licence

subsection.content: An application for a licence and for the renewal of a licence shall be lodged with the licensing authority and shall be accompanied by 2 copies of a recent photograph of the applicant and such documents as may be prescribed in Part II of Form 1 in Schedule 1.
Where the prescribed document is a sketch or plan, it shall be signed by the applicant certifying that it is a true copy.

section.name: s4
section.heading: Fee for licence
section.content: The prescribed fee for the issue of a licence and for the renewal of a licence shall be that in Schedule 2.

section.name: s5
section.heading: Licence
section.content: The prescribed form of a licence and a renewal of a licence shall be that in Form 2 in Schedule 1.

crossHeading.inline:
Application for the Issue / Renewal of
a Massage Establishments Licence

tr.td: I . hereby apply for a licence to operate a massage establishment at
In support of my application I submit the following information and particulars—
Note: If you are not a Hong Kong permanent resident, you are required to attach proof of entitlement to take up employment in Hong Kong.
Indicate by deleting as necessary whether you are literate in—
both the Chinese language and the English language.
Name (in English and in Chinese) of the proposed massage establishment
Address of the proposed massage establishment (including floor, and flat/shop/unit number as appropriate)
Indicate by deleting as necessary whether the proposed massage establishment will be in premises that are—
a mixed commercial and residential building.
If the premises is a mixed commercial and residential building is there direct access from the commercial to the residential area?
Indicate by deleting as necessary whether you are—
the owner of the premises in which the massage establishment will be situated;
the principal tenant of such premises; or
If you are not the owner of such premises, you are required to supply the owner’s name and address, and details of any agent through whom the owner may be contacted—
Name of owner (in English and in Chinese)
Name of agent of owner (in English and in Chinese)
Indicate by deleting as necessary whether the massage establishment will be owned by—

If the massage establishment is to be owned by another individual you are required in respect of that individual, to supply name in English and in Chinese, CCCs if applicable, Hong Kong Identity Card number, residential and business addresses and telephone numbers—
If the massage establishment is to be owned by a partnership you are required to state—
The date the partnership was formed

td.center: Residential address and contact telephone number

tr.td: If the massage establishment is to be owned by a body corporate you are required to state—

td.center: Residential address and contact telephone number

tr.td: In respect of each bank at which an account is maintained or is intended to be maintained in connection with the operation of the massage establishment you are required to state—
If any person is to be employed as a manager, assistant manager or in any way assist you in the management of the massage establishment you are required to provide—

td.center: Residential address and contact telephone number

tr.td: Have you ever previously applied for a massage establishment licence? YES/NO
Name and address of the premises in respect of which application was made
Whether the application was successful? YES/NO

Have you ever been convicted in Hong Kong or elsewhere for any offence (except a traffic offence for which you were fined $1,000 HK Dollars or its equivalent in other currencies or less and did not suffer the loss of your driving licence)?

Note: The provisions in section 2 of the Rehabilitation of Offenders Ordinance (Chapter 297) do not by reason of section 4 of that Ordinance apply to proceedings related to a person’s suitability to be granted or to continue to hold a licence. No conviction will be regarded as ‘spent’ and details of all convictions must therefore be included.
DOCUMENTS TO BE SUBMITTED BY APPLICANT
You are required to submit, together with this application, the following documents—
2 recent passport size photographs of yourself;
3 copies of a floor plan of the proposed massage establishment showing—
to what use each part of the massage establishment will be put;
the dimensions of each such part;
the locations of fire-fighting equipment; and
Each copy must be signed by you certifying that it is a true copy of the floor plan.
applications for renewal which involve structural alterations to the premises,
you are also required under the Buildings Ordinance (Chapter 123) to submit plans through an ‘authorized person’ to the Building Authority for approval.

3 copies of a sketch of the sign which will be erected to advertise the massage establishment. The sketch must indicate the wording, size and materials to be used in respect of the sign. If the sign is to be illuminated you are required to indicate the method of illumination;
Each copy must be signed by you certifying that it is a true copy of the sign.
3 copies of a sketch showing the location of the sign referred to in (d);
Each copy must be signed by you certifying that it is a true copy of the sign.
if the massage establishment is to be owned by a partnership, a copy of the partnership agreement and business registration certificate of that partnership; and
if the massage establishment is to be owned by a body corporate, a copy of the Certificate of Incorporation issued by the Registrar of Companies.

I DECLARE that the information and particulars submitted by me in support of this application are, to the best of my knowledge and belief, both true and correct. I have read the Massage Establishments Ordinance (Chapter 266) and the Massage Establishments Regulations made thereunder. I understand that section 13(3) of the Ordinance provides that any person who makes any false or misleading statement or furnishes any false or misleading information in connection with any application for the issue or renewal of a licence commits an offence and shall be liable to a fine at level 5 and to imprisonment for 6 months.
LICENCE is granted this . day of . 20 . to (name) . (Hong Kong Identity Card No. .) to operate a massage establishment at (address of Premises)
for a period of 12 months/24 months* from date of grant. THIS LICENCE is subject to those conditions endorsed on the document attached hereto.

text.editorialNote: Editorial Note:For the transitional provision relating to the amendments made by the Massage Establishments (Amendment) Regulation 2003 (L.N. 51 of 2003), see section 4 of the Regulation.

tr.td: Fee for the issue of a licence
Fee for the renewal of a licence (whether for a renewal period of 12 months or 24 months)
